|brand = D-Link |model = DIR-879 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = EXO |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2IR879A1 |icid = 4216A-IR879A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8198CS; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 1074Kc |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 620 MHz (up to 1 GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 16 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15F1G1664A-DEB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SU-MIMO |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85405;;3; ,,, 5GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85606-11;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/09/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00PVDO8YK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8194AR; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8814AR; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Performance – AC1900 Dual Band Wi-Fi Performance *Coverage – Extreme Coverage and Range with High Power Amplifiers *Latest technology – AC SmartBeam and SmartConnect *Unique design – Premium Stylish Design *Fast wired connections – Gigabit Ethernet Ports<small> *High-power amplifiers (1000 mW) - Wider coverage throughout your home *SmartConnect - Band steering balances wireless devices among the two wireless bands *Smart Beam Forming - Dramatically enhances wireless signal strength and throughput *Dual Core Processor - Faster wireless speeds, improved coverage and reliable connections *Dual Band Wireless - Surf the internet on 2.4 GHz band while streaming HD on 5 GHz band *Built-in gigabit ports - Fast and reliable wired connections *Intelligent QoS - Device optimization delivers seamless performance for applications *Eliminate dead zones - Full coverage to reach dead zone in home environment</small>
===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC1900 ultimate AC performance (600+1300 Mbps) * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz, 600Mbps (2.4 GHz) + 1300Mbps (5 GHz) * Data Rate: 802.11n: up to 600Mbps, 802.11ac: up to 1300Mbps * Antenna: 4x transmit (3x)/receive (4x) fixed internal antennas * Interface: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN (10/100/1000Mbps), USB (no) * Power Adapter: Input: 100~240VAC, 50/60 Hz, Output: 12VDC/1.5A (2A)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32995-dlink-dir-879-ac1900-exo-wifi-router-reviewed ''D-Link DIR-879 AC1900 EXO Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8198C @1GHz MIPS1074K Dual-Core (5x GbE) :RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 128MB (NAND)/16MB (SPI) :WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8194AR (2.4GHz), [[Realtek]] RTL8814AR (5GHz) :*2.4GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8194AR 4x4 3 stream 2.4GHz SoC :- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x3) :- [[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA (x4) :*5GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8814AR 4x4 3 stream 5GHz SoC :- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x3) :- [[Skyworks]] SKY85606-11 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA (x4)
===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32925-d-link-ces-2016-announcements ''D-Link CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[D-Link DIR-869]] - ''AC1750 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) and 450Mbps (2.4GHz) {$129.99} :D-Link DIR-879 - ''AC1900 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) and 600Mbps (2.4GHz) {$149.99} ::RTL8198CS / RTL8814AR / RTL8194AR - [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9974/dlink-demonstrates-innovative-networking-solutions-at-ces PR] *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/unified-home-wi-fi-network-kit/ ''Unified Home Wi-Fi Network Kit DKT-891 - CES 2016'' on '''D-Link'''] (US) :[[D-Link DIR-891L]] - ''AC4300 Tri-Band MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' {$369.99} ::2x 1733Mbps (5GHz) and 800Mbps (2.4GHz), Qualcomm MU|EFX :[[D-Link DAP-1655]] - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-Fi Extender'' ::867Mbps (5GHz) and 450Mbps (2.4GHz)
